alert.note: Alert for Livingston (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 6:38PM EDT until June 25 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT FOR EASTERN SHIAWASSEE...EASTERN LIVINGSTON AND GENESEE COUNTIES... At 638 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fenton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Lake Fenton around 650 PM EDT. Grand Blanc and Goodrich around 700 PM EDT. Davison and Burton around 715 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Atlas, Juddville, Rankin, Island Lake State Recreation Area, Thetford Township, Argentine, Genesee, Vernon, Tyrone Township and Deerfield Township. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for southeastern Michigan. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
